name: 帕洛玛·加西亚-李
name_full: 帕洛玛·加西亚-李 Paloma Garcia-Lee

last_movies.title: 莫莉和麦克斯在未来的故事

introduction: Paloma Garcia-Lee is an American actress, dancer, singer, and writer known for her standout performances on both stage and screen. With an extensive theatrical background, Paloma made her Broadway principal debut at just 17 years old. Since then, she has been featured in 6 Broadway productions and has an impressive array of additional theater credits, including performances at Radio City Music Hall, Carnegie Hall, and The Kennedy Center. Paloma made her impressive feature film debut as Graziella in Steven Spielberg's West Side Story. She continues to build quite a name for herself on screen appearing in numerous TV shows and Films while balancing life across multiple artistic mediums. In addition to her acting career, Paloma is writing and developing a series with her writing partner and looks forward to continuing to expand her artistry in every way she can.
